name: Dfhg-dev
tagline: Digital Fragmenta Historicorum Graecorum (DFHG): a machine-corrected version of the five volumes of Karl Müller's Fragmenta Historicorum Graecorum.
body:
#Welcome to dfhg-dev!

##About
This repository contains machine-corrected [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) versions of the five volumes of Karl Müller's _Fragmenta Historicorum Graecorum_ (FHG). The files are encoded by the _Open Greek and Latin_ [research team](http://www.dh.uni-leipzig.de/wo/projects/open-greek-and-latin-project/) (researchers and student assistants).
While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

If you want to help or contribute to the encoding process, please read the following documentation:
* [DFHG Guidelines (1.0)](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1T6_2QXx1NVRE5irlQtYKtgkZhJTcq07_wjrWhoRpO1k/edit).
* [DFHG Authors](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AjbUiC-X1utCdERpVExHbko2R3luUjMtYm9neUxCVnc&usp=drive_web#gid=0). 

For a full description of the DFHG project, please visit our [website](http://www.dh.uni-leipzig.de/wo/open-philology-project/digital-fragmenta-historicorum-graecorum-dfhg-project/).

##Contents
For a comprehensive view of the contents of the FHG, click [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AjbUiC-X1utCdERpVExHbko2R3luUjMtYm9neUxCVnc#gid=0). Authors encoded thus far are:

###Volume 1
* [Ister Cyrenaeus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Ister_Cyrenaeus)

###Volume 2
* [Hippias Eleus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Hippias_Eleus)
* [Damastes Sigeus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Damastes_Sigeensis)
* [Anaximander Milesius](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Anaximander_Milesius)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
